subject: Running
Marathon Running
Olympic Games (2008)
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Mike Morgan and Brian Sell are part of the Hansons-Brooks Distance Project, whose goal is to give runners a chance to see if they can compete internationally at the highest levels.
